text:
Hugo Arana (July 23, 1943 – October 11, 2020) was an Argentine actor and comedian. He was born in Monte Grande, Argentina. His career began in 1970. His best known roles were in "El Santo de la Espada", "The Truce" and "Los exitosos Pells".
Arana died at a Buenos Aires hospital from COVID-19 on October 11, 2020 at the age of 77.
